column3:
“Three Kings is a first for me, and I was given the royal treatment! I've been active for 30 years, lived in Hawaii, California, and grew up largely in Colorado. 

This is an impressive high; quick to the head where it settles in, drops the lids, and then moves to the whole body; intense; long-lasting; great for daytime use & engaging in other activities; it tapers off evenly & slowly; smooth. This is not one for true...”

“As I sit here again, high on 3 kings vape- I think to myself, wow this strain really makes you give ZERO fucks. I was SO pissed at a coworker today and bitched about it ALL damn day until WAIT...  until 3 kings kicked in. I'm about to go be best friends with this person now. 
Happiness and Anxiety relief is by far one of the BEST yet. If I shit my pants right now I wouldn't give one fuck. 
No body high whatsoever so ...”
“I have no idea where I am right now”
“I have never been so goddamn stoned in my entire life what the fuck dude.”
“bought ten G's smoked about 1/4 i love to crumble weed 3kings falls right apart yet its fluffy too wake and bake in the morning”

“I feel like a big floppy penis right now. One hit and I'm having thoughts of unicorns and flying tofurky. Huge body high, numbs the whole body. Very euphoric. You become a complete MORON on this strain though so don't do it if you plan on having a strategic board game night! Add some edibles to this and you will FLY and laugh your ass off!!!”

“Got half a gram free for registering as a new patient at Tree House Collective in Vista CA. Sorry, just turned on veggie tales. Anyway I'm not usually a huge fan of indicas but this hybrid definitely relaxes you and makes your eyelids a tad heavy. The budtender called this stuff topshelf and no strain has made me feel like this (because of my tolerance) in a while.”

“Amazing cannabis!  In addition to my spinal issues,I am having dental issues...shudder.. but the Kings really rose to the occasion. Then came the high.....almost brought this oldtimer to his knees! The lineage of all three donors shows in this piece of magic.  My body can cope very well, and I have stopped swearing at the rat bastard dentist.....if I could give more than five stars. Kudos and namaste, oh bringers of ...”

“Review of 3 Kings Kush. Nice dense dark green nugs. STICKY!!! Smells like straight kush! Piney and pungent. A nice potent hybrid. Indica effects are fairly strong and the sativa effects take away my stress and put my mind at ease. I'm able to relax my mind and sleep on this one. Very very nice strain.”
“I was skeptical about this strain after trying Three kings I was amazed it relieved my stress instantly. I will put it my top 10 strains . three; kings is a 4 star treat.”

“This sativa dominant flower packs an absolute punch in the face. The effects are strong and immediate. Very stoney and heady. The come down from 3 kings is pretty heavy and sleepy. The buds are sticky icky. Dark green with really nice reddish calyxes. Some of the buds have some nice speckles of purple. The smell is earthy and mildly fuely. It's a nice balance of the parents. Taste is crazy earthy. Great for digestive...”

“First time trying it and I enjoyed it because it made me more social (which is hard for me to do due to anxiety disorder) but it also made me giggly, all smiles, and heavily concentrated on my hearing senses.”

“Just wanted to dispel bad reviews of this strain. 1, if you like headband your gonna love OSourHead re:3 kings. It's headband on roids. It's almost funny the same ppl who give headband 10/10 have rated this as average .”

“This bud comes on with a heavy body buzz. It is fantastic. Then as the body buzz is fully realized the head high kicks in. Very good pot for artists or the creative types. It is the best of both worlds without the heavy tired feeling afterwards that I am used to from a good indica. This nug smells great and is recognized before it leaves the jar. I recommend smoking some of this and listening to some high quality hea...”

“This is my favorite strain. It’s the only strain I’ve found that will completely take care of migraine pain. Also excellent for body pain, both muscular and joint pain. No side effects for me from this one. Very relaxing, but not at all sedating. Great for day and night.”
“by far my fav strain...the smell, taste n buzz vaped is amazing...and im in Pennsylvania avenue”
“I remember the day I had three kings and it was one of the happiest days of my life. everything was so great and the bud had me so lifted at the same time”
“sour diesel n og kush are two of my favorite strains.. so when i heard of the 3kings. i had no choice but to try it. this strain had me feeling really really great ! ha ha”

“One of the best strains I’ve smoked in a while. i’m a daily smoker and this hit me hard. I feel good. If you let your body and eyes relax with it, it takes over. Probably shouldn’t smoke this before class or work. Got the munchies too”
“This is my third time around with the Kings, and it still has me happy. It has helped with pain and mood, and the flavor and scent are still unique.  Big thumbs up!”
“one of my favorite strains yet. nice quick head high followed by a mellow body high. I love the stickiness of the buds, has an awesome aroma and a great taste to match”

“Wow, what a fitting name! OG x Headband x Sour Diesel. It really is the best of all spectrums.  It's the perfect daytime smoke for people who experience anxiety as the OG works well to knock off the 'tense' feeling sometimes brought on by Sour D. 
I think this new strains popularity will grow quickly due to it's mass appeal.”

“This strain can be one of 3 things. indica, hybrid or sativa dominate in effects. My dispensary labeled my middle shelf" potency 8th 3 Kings as straight indica. Indica happens to be my choice favorite but eyeing up the genetics and reviews each buy could be different. OG Kush always hits me as a nighttime "creeper" couch lock strain and my 3 kings feels very similar. I do have a very slight "headband" feeling which ...”"

“How could you go wrong with this bud lineage: Headband, Sour Diesel & OG Kush. Real head strong buzz which provides a clear mind, with a slight body buzz. My first inhale was smooth, Exhale I just felt so relaxed, with an invigorating upbeat, chill, mellow, productive high.”

“Wow, what a fitting name! OG x Headband x Sour Diesel. It really is the best of all spectrums.  It's the perfect daytime smoke for people who experience anxiety as the OG works well to knock off the 'tense' feeling sometimes brought on by Sour D. 
I think this new strains popularity will grow quickly due to it's mass appeal.”
“I took a few hit's out of a vape pen and found that this strain is really good for my anxiety and depression!”
“i feel at one with my body after a bowl of this. good for watching music videos”

“One of the best overall strains. When it hits, you feel it but it isn't overwhelming. The flower is so fluffy and the high is super relaxed and pretty euphoric. Would not recommend newbies (especially the nervous ones), because of how strong it hits at first. The come down is very steady; it almost sneaks up on you. 15/10 would absolutely recommend (unless you don't like that sour diesel taste, it's definitely there ...”
“I might be wound too tightly for this cartridge. Great for day use. Amazing citrus taste. Good sativa.”
“Incredibly earthy with a citrus high note and smooth exhale. Very mellow, but still strong enough to get rid of any pain and keep me nice and relaxed.”
“Overall decent high, not a downer at all. Good for a group sesh or when you're looking to get creative. Also is a good experience when mixed with caffeine. Get some snacks ready first though, lol.”

“One of the best Sativa's i have ever had because it made me so happy & euphoric. Also, was uplifted & relaxed. Cerebral effects without heavy sedation. The light green buds had light brown hairs & lots of fine crystals. Taste & smell was an earthy pine. Strain was cultivated by Bloom Farms & had 16% THC. Your 3 Kings experience awaits.....”
“Overall decent high, not a downer at all. Good for a group sesh or when you're looking to get creative. Also is a good experience when mixed with caffeine. Get some snacks ready first though, lol.”
“Taste like O.G. Kush that ends with Sour Diesel!!..Looks the same way.. Feels the same way...Perfect combo!”
“one of my favorite strains very up beat for me.. didn't find very many downsides as well. smeels and taste amazing. good day time smoke.”
“Looked it up online and people say online it is Sour Diesel x OG Kush x Headband" but I am not sure 100%
column4: also heard something about it being called "707" something or other
column5: but anyways this is a really good Sativa strain (and even for those who don't like Sativas much I'd still recommend this cause I liked it that much). It definitely tastes like headband and sour d for those who are headband/sour d fans

column3: “Definitely the best green on the market right now. Just bought an oz. and I'm watching Mac and Devin, yeah I'm that high.”

“I wanted an Indica and I got 3 Kings, which is a Sativa based Hybrid, with some Indica highlights.  

The one weed that I usually order is Cheese because it's so effective with pain and helps with sleep. I have a painful neurological disorder.

Recently, a great idea came to mind! I mixed 3 Kings w/ Cheese and was instantly delighted! What I got was a wonderland of potency, taste, undeniable energy and a high that wo...”
“I understand the name, 3 kings holds up to its name, and provided me with such a great high, talkative and friendly, this is a great strain.”
“it was cool nice euphoric relaxinfmg nice body buzz”

“This powerful strain is one of my current favorites, just picked up a batch from Rose in Venice.  smooth diesel-y taste and a wonderful head high that isn't anxiety inducing, with just the right balance of indica to sativa.  Good for relaxing, creative endeavors and social situations (I haven't giggled like this since my first dab).  A+”

“Skeptical that this could really be great... I was wrong... It will make the world right... I went from being overwhelmed with stress to feeling full of hope and love... Sounds silly but if you want a new outlook on life... Smoke this”
“it was cool nice euphoric relaxinfmg nice body buzz”
“Beautiful smell and high.”
“Pretty good strain. Smoking right now. I’m really calm and mellow lol”

“A cross breed between three fine strains: Headband,Sour diesel, OG kush.

Why isn't this strain more popular? Or even more popular than blue dream? Beats me. 

I loaded up a bowl in a mini bong, and took a hit; my first words were Wow" *lip smack* "Damn this taste good".

column2: and it's overwhelming in a good way (most weed taste the same)
column3: but this
column5: you tasted EVERY SINGLE FLAVOR of e...”"

column3: “What a great stain. I smoked in the morning and got everything handled that I needed to handle. And had a smile the whole time. Was great for this busy stresses mama”
“I love this strain great relaxing high!”

“I wanted an Indica and I got 3 Kings, which is a Sativa based Hybrid, with some Indica highlights.  

The one weed that I usually order is Cheese because it's so effective with pain and helps with sleep. I have a painful neurological disorder.

Recently, a great idea came to mind! I mixed 3 Kings w/ Cheese and was instantly delighted! What I got was a wonderland of potency, taste, undeniable energy and a high that wo...”
“I understand the name, 3 kings holds up to its name, and provided me with such a great high, talkative and friendly, this is a great strain.”

“I see a lot of people that didn't like it.  I loved it.  It had a good THC level and was a great trio of Headband, Sour Diesel, and OG Kush (even though Headband = Sour Diesel x OG Kush).  The three together aren't bad.  Headband is a favorite of mine.  Have yet to try decent OG Kush or Sour Diesel by themselves. Still, 3 Kings delivers a happy, relaxed and euphoric high for me.  I was even able to blaze at work and ...”

“A cross breed between three fine strains: Headband,Sour diesel, OG kush.

Why isn't this strain more popular? Or even more popular than blue dream? Beats me. 

I loaded up a bowl in a mini bong, and took a hit; my first words were Wow" *lip smack* "Damn this taste good".

column2: and it's overwhelming in a good way (most weed taste the same)
column3: but this
column5: you tasted EVERY SINGLE FLAVOR of e...”"

column3: “If you are into Sour Diesels ability to help you stay creative and focus on your work, 3 kings is the only equivalent to that experience. Very cerebral high, keeps you on the top of artistic or engineering game. Strong diesel taste and very pungent. I also agree with some on this about it being very intense and not for beginners" or people who do not like intense cerebral experiences with their bud. I would also sug...”"

“3 Kings (Original Clone)
Looks: Knobby sour d structure with wild pink hairs weaving through its teal/silver/white buds. Unreeal, some people may not think it was bud.
Smell/Taste: The most sour smell and taste imaginable, hard to describe it because its not kerosene or pine, but a perfect blend of the 3 distinct flavors of its parents. A distinct flavor nothing else resembles.
Effects: Again, amazing, uplifting ener...”
“What a great stain. I smoked in the morning and got everything handled that I needed to handle. And had a smile the whole time. Was great for this busy stresses mama”

“This powerful strain is one of my current favorites, just picked up a batch from Rose in Venice.  smooth diesel-y taste and a wonderful head high that isn't anxiety inducing, with just the right balance of indica to sativa.  Good for relaxing, creative endeavors and social situations (I haven't giggled like this since my first dab).  A+”

“Skeptical that this could really be great... I was wrong... It will make the world right... I went from being overwhelmed with stress to feeling full of hope and love... Sounds silly but if you want a new outlook on life... Smoke this”
“I love this strain great relaxing high!”
“First time trying this strain. Amazing. That deep slow motion high but without the couchlock. Cottonmout like a mfer tho. Lol”
“Looked it up online and people say online it is Sour Diesel x OG Kush x Headband" but I am not sure 100%
column4: also heard something about it being called "707" something or other
column5: but anyways this is a really good Sativa strain (and even for those who don't like Sativas much I'd still recommend this cause I liked it that much). It definitely tastes like headband and sour d for those who are headband/sour d fans

column3: “Taste like O.G. Kush that ends with Sour Diesel!!..Looks the same way.. Feels the same way...Perfect combo!”

“This is the first time I have tried trilogy og and I love it!!!!!! I bought a golden stash concentrate and it is now my favorite strain very relaxed but u can still focus very good for pain anxiety depression headaches mood swings mental disorder very heady but good clean high I love it...”
“Great Smoke 😌”

“This powerful strain is one of my current favorites, just picked up a batch from Rose in Venice.  smooth diesel-y taste and a wonderful head high that isn't anxiety inducing, with just the right balance of indica to sativa.  Good for relaxing, creative endeavors and social situations (I haven't giggled like this since my first dab).  A+”

“This strain had been canned for quite a while, I finally got around to popping the lid and giving it a shot. 

I like it. It's light, clear headed and relaxing. It's a different type of relaxation than I've felt before. Focus on a task for a while, then move an arm or leg. It seems as if everything falls in place.

Not quite sure why the negatives has such a high Anxious" bar. I felt no such thing.

“I see a lot of people that didn't like it.  I loved it.  It had a good THC level and was a great trio of Headband, Sour Diesel, and OG Kush (even though Headband = Sour Diesel x OG Kush).  The three together aren't bad.  Headband is a favorite of mine.  Have yet to try decent OG Kush or Sour Diesel by themselves. Still, 3 Kings delivers a happy, relaxed and euphoric high for me.  I was even able to blaze at work and ...”

“This powerful strain is one of my current favorites, just picked up a batch from Rose in Venice.  smooth diesel-y taste and a wonderful head high that isn't anxiety inducing, with just the right balance of indica to sativa.  Good for relaxing, creative endeavors and social situations (I haven't giggled like this since my first dab).  A+”
“Lovely, heady, chatty high. Good but not great muscle relaxation.”
“Beautiful smell and high.”
“it was cool nice euphoric relaxinfmg nice body buzz”

“after three days of serious back pain this had me feeling brand new. Very euphoric feeling. No laziness but heavy eye lids. I felt more concentrated as well really good cerebral and body high, definitely a new favorite.”
“*CHOKING this is a real throat burner. I love the taste, it taste kinda piney got me high in a couple hits!!!”

“3 Kings is Trainwreck x Sour Diesel x OG Kush. My sample was obtained through SF Green Delivery and was tested via SC Labs at 26.4% THC and was organically grown. It is a hybrid but is sativa-dominant. The effect is a nice cerebral high and light on the body. As with Headband, it seems kind of redundant, in that Sour D and OG Kush both came from the same parents: the Chem/Diesel lineage; making Sour D and OG Kush aki...”

“If you are into Sour Diesels ability to help you stay creative and focus on your work, 3 kings is the only equivalent to that experience. Very cerebral high, keeps you on the top of artistic or engineering game. Strong diesel taste and very pungent. I also agree with some on this about it being very intense and not for beginners" or people who do not like intense cerebral experiences with their bud. I would also sug...”"
“First time trying this strain. Amazing. That deep slow motion high but without the couchlock. Cottonmout like a mfer tho. Lol”
“*CHOKING this is a real throat burner. I love the taste, it taste kinda piney got me high in a couple hits!!!”
“I love this strain great relaxing high!”
“This stuff is amazing!! I took one nice hit and calm washed over me quickly, and it also has a nice somewhat vicodin like high.”
“I good strain. Calm relaxed high, without paranoia.”
“Amazing taste, I can definitely taste the sour and feel the headband, very uplifting high”
“I have just smoked a blunt an afler a long day of work its decent its not a down high its mellow head rush to heavy eyes definitely not stressed but yet agin not my favorite 👍”

“I give other Cup-winning strains 4 stars. Not this one kiddos! I'm from the pre-96 crowd and strongly prefer heavier Indicas... but this truly is a genetic masterpiece and the synergy between its parents is remarkable! Heavy enough to be used at night, yet the initial onset of dab-like euphoria is extremely uplifting for a wake-and-bake option.

You MUST try this flower! I'd die unfulfilled had I not come across this...”
“excellent day time strain. VERY pungent.  Skunky earth smell as soon as the jar opens. The sour diesel is very prominent. No laziness either.”
“nice mellow high”
“Great for insomnia and anxiety. Makes you a bit sleepy, but you can still function. Difficult to think.”
“Just got a half oz of it and it got me high as fuck lol not the best taste but smells Dank and gets the job done!”

“Big fluffy buds that grind up easily. Good smooth, sweet and sour flavor in the vaporizer. 
Silly and smiley high that made for good times with the husband. Fantastic for anxiety and depression! 
Treat yo self to this bud :))”

“Big fluffy buds that grind up easily. Good smooth, sweet and sour flavor in the vaporizer. 
Silly and smiley high that made for good times with the husband. Fantastic for anxiety and depression! 
Treat yo self to this bud :))”
“I can’t feel my legs♿️”
“it's great for blunts, I do love a bong bowl but I'd say it's best used for blunts”
“Definitely relaxing, not so much a pain reducer and has a super earthy taste”

“Three Kings is one of the best sativa dominant hybrids I’ve dabbed. 
Right off the bat I noticed how smooth it was, it almost cooled my throat.
The high was like being wrapped up in a cozy sweater. 
It’s definitely an awake and productive high. It brightened my mood and took the edge off the day. 
Definitely would recommend to people looking for a heady sativa who still have things to do throughout the day.”
“pretty good strain! its very frosty and gives u a nice euphoric and energetic high. nice daytime medication”
“Very potent, gets you a real nice head high quickly.”
“Amazing scent and high. Body buzz is there, pain and stress minimizes. You may become sleepy, try 2 grams. Smells like sweet pine and lemons. Must try for any patient! 8/10”

“Three Kings is one of the best sativa dominant hybrids I’ve dabbed. 
Right off the bat I noticed how smooth it was, it almost cooled my throat.
The high was like being wrapped up in a cozy sweater. 
It’s definitely an awake and productive high. It brightened my mood and took the edge off the day. 
Definitely would recommend to people looking for a heady sativa who still have things to do throughout the day.”
“Nice smoke very smooth. Helped me focus on one thing”
“Heavy hitter, sit you down type of strain. An easy favorite for me. If I see it, I grab it every time.”
“Stoney AF !”

“I smoked an eighth of this and went moshing. this is some loud loud, but a very good high. nothing crazy, really good body high. I was drinking beer with this one and let me tell you, I had one of the best nights of my life. I felt so wasted yet so in control and conscious. it was great :)”
“Very potent, gets you a real nice head high quickly.”
“Excellent taste and great daytime strain”

“Very sativa..so many chrystally-like buds..first puffs were like explosives..after finishing up the sesh, the amount i had smoked already had made me very couch-locked from how medicated i had gotten..im still writing this after i have medically medicated myself countless bong hits and smoked 3 blunts here i am about to fall into a deep, lucid sleep. One of my favorites recently; without a doubt.”
“Amazing scent and high. Body buzz is there, pain and stress minimizes. You may become sleepy, try 2 grams. Smells like sweet pine and lemons. Must try for any patient! 8/10”

“Picked this strain up yesterday for the first time, and it is straight fire! I'm a Sativa strain smoker, and this by far has been the smoothest and most uplifting high. I suffer from PTSD and this helps out immensely!”

“Very dark buds due to the resin coated buds. Smelled very earthy almost chocolate like. Love the way this bud breaks up it shreds up nicely and does not turn into dust. More like little resin balls . when you hit it it has that deep lingering effect that makes you cough really deep. Great mellow high that makes you feel at peace with the world.”
“love the smell and taste. nice good high. definitely a Kush taste.”
“Heavy hitter, sit you down type of strain. An easy favorite for me. If I see it, I grab it every time.”
“Great for insomnia and anxiety. Makes you a bit sleepy, but you can still function. Difficult to think.”

“I smoked an eighth of this and went moshing. this is some loud loud, but a very good high. nothing crazy, really good body high. I was drinking beer with this one and let me tell you, I had one of the best nights of my life. I felt so wasted yet so in control and conscious. it was great :)”
“Excellent taste and great daytime strain”

“Buds look velvety and smell like Berry or Blue Dream, which is weird because that's not really what it's supposed to smell like. But my smell might be off so, eh. I smoked a big ol' bowl of this and then proceeded to do some meditation, yoga, and cleaning. I thought the smoke was a bit harsh even though I had just cleaned my bong and filled it with new, hot water. It could just be a harsher strain to smoke, too. This...”

“This strain is okay. the dry mouth is pretty bad, dizzy is intense as well. The euphoric feeling is great but then the munchies and drowsiness kick in pretty heavily. Not my favorite sativa but I’ve had worse.”
“i really enjoyed this bud gor me laid bacc relaxing”
“I can’t feel my legs♿️”

“Very sativa..so many chrystally-like buds..first puffs were like explosives..after finishing up the sesh, the amount i had smoked already had made me very couch-locked from how medicated i had gotten..im still writing this after i have medically medicated myself countless bong hits and smoked 3 blunts here i am about to fall into a deep, lucid sleep. One of my favorites recently; without a doubt.”
“excellent day time strain. VERY pungent.  Skunky earth smell as soon as the jar opens. The sour diesel is very prominent. No laziness either.”

“To answer a few of your questions, 3 Kings -> 20 - 25% THC.  Damn good weed. It has a Piney, Skunky, Pungent smell, w/ a great taste to follow.  After use, it was a very euphoric high, strait to your head, as expected from a strain bred w/ Headband, OGK, & Sour D.  I didn't move from my spot for the 1st 2hrs.  Happy as hell while I sat there.  I for sure will be buying this strain again.”
“Great stuff”
“Stoney AF !”
“pretty good strain! its very frosty and gives u a nice euphoric and energetic high. nice daytime medication”
“Very potent, gets you a real nice head high quickly.”
“This was a new one for me and it didn't disappoint. Very dense buds that really have you choking in a good way. Had cherry pie at the same time and this was clearly the better in comparison.”
“Good head high, will give you a dry mouth. Definitely sativa. Had a pre rolled thin cone and it did the job, don't feel couch locked either.”
“Amazing scent and high. Body buzz is there, pain and stress minimizes. You may become sleepy, try 2 grams. Smells like sweet pine and lemons. Must try for any patient! 8/10”

“Picked this strain up yesterday for the first time, and it is straight fire! I'm a Sativa strain smoker, and this by far has been the smoothest and most uplifting high. I suffer from PTSD and this helps out immensely!”

“Very dark buds due to the resin coated buds. Smelled very earthy almost chocolate like. Love the way this bud breaks up it shreds up nicely and does not turn into dust. More like little resin balls . when you hit it it has that deep lingering effect that makes you cough really deep. Great mellow high that makes you feel at peace with the world.”
“love the smell and taste. nice good high. definitely a Kush taste.”
“Love the blend... Good high!”

“Sometimes, 1 King is better than 3. (I'm not polyamorous but I don't hate on people who are). More than 1 King is just confusing. The war battles come from all angles with 3 Kings, but if you like surprises - that may be a good thing.”

“The Genetics of 3 Kings are Trainwreck X DIESEL X KUSH . It smells similar to the Diesel and appears like it too. This strain is the most wanted hybrid of all. Nice fluffy nugs that smells of lemons and sweet and sour..”
“Got me higher than a mafacker”
“Nice smoke very smooth. Helped me focus on one thing”
“Extremely strong. immediate heavy pressure behind the eyes, energetic but smooth lift. plan some me time to fully enjoy this regal strain!”
“This strain is the bomb 😍 it tastes amazing, smells amazing, looks amazing. Try some out 👌🏼”
“It's amazing what you can do with OG Kush and Sour Diesel. Love this strain, wish I could source more than an ounce at a time!”

“After I finished putting up my fence on Sage n Sour, I am ending the evening with 3 Kings. Taste is like a lemon butter cookie, quite delicious! Hits you quickly, no creepin' goin' on here! It does only get stronger though. Superb euphoria; I could sit in front of the TV and the PS4 noise is more mesmerizing than the actually game. My head is very high that it's throbbing. You can get side tracked easily so don't lis...”
“OK three of my faves together is just amazing, and this batch I received is above par!!!”

“Second sampling:  I am pleased to report that the second sampling is STILL an amazing find.  My pain is managed beautifully.  I am recieving spinal epidural injections this coming week, and the Kings will make a great difference in my recovery time and possitive attitude.  Thanks again for the good work, please keep it in your inventory.”
“Weed doesn't taste or smell pleasant. But it's a good high.”
“great smell....very strong high initially..becomes very mellow and relaxing”
“Bomb strain a must try will not be disappointed. A heavy and long lasting high.”
“This is the best bud I myself have ever smoked I have never heard of it before until my dealer said he has 3 kings.”
“This stuff is pretty amazing! I experienced virtually no down sides to this strain.. very up beat for vibe me. one of my favorites. Taste amazing!”

“Is much like sour diesel, part of its genome. Tangy and sticky phenomes prevail, as does the THC potency. Some data shows an ambiguity in the Tw/Hb parency, but the moniker represents a trifecta of 215 botany.”

“This particular strain has a very positive, up beat effect. It's very nice to smoke before going out. It doesn't make you awkward at all. I don't see the paranoid aspect. The only con I can think of is that it goes very fast. 
Xoxo
Rizzyblazeit”
“A nice gentle sativa hybrid. It has a generally earthy flavor. Not bad, but not essentially out of the ordinary.”

“perfect hybrid- the buds smell like a Chinese person in a rice paddy. nice smooth pleasant taste. great body buzz from this and also heavy head effects-the best of Indica and the best of sativa properties as far as use.”

“perfect hybrid- the buds smell like a Chinese person in a rice paddy. nice smooth pleasant taste. great body buzz from this and also heavy head effects-the best of Indica and the best of sativa properties as far as use.”
“Knocks me out for around 6-12 hours depending on how long I go without THC. Recommended for relaxation and getting away from stress.”
“nice and strong, no manky aftertaste, used this while trying out micro-dosing for pain management. don't have a bad thing to say about it!”

“Got some in a cartridge form.

First off, this strain was super clear-headed, almost to the point of not feeling it. If you don't pay attention to being high, you might miss it. What I do feel, however, is a little more talkative, less stressed,  and forgetful. This might be a good choice for someone who needs some social lubricant, but doesn't want to feel turnt".

“perfect hybrid- the buds smell like a Chinese person in a rice paddy. nice smooth pleasant taste. great body buzz from this and also heavy head effects-the best of Indica and the best of sativa properties as far as use.”

“Its only good for like two basketball games and then i feel like a noodle and lose all coordination. I got my stuff ripped by a dude built like shrek And for some reason this strain always messes up my stomach. But if im finna eat, its a total gamechanger. I deadass ate 6 bagels.”

“perfect hybrid- the buds smell like a Chinese person in a rice paddy. nice smooth pleasant taste. great body buzz from this and also heavy head effects-the best of Indica and the best of sativa properties as far as use.”

“Three Kings is one of the best sativa dominant hybrids I’ve dabbed. 
Right off the bat I noticed how smooth it was, it almost cooled my throat.
The high was like being wrapped up in a cozy sweater. 
It’s definitely an awake and productive high. It brightened my mood and took the edge off the day. 
Definitely would recommend to people looking for a heady sativa who still have things to do throughout the day.”
“Very mellow but somehow intense.”
“Very high. A lot of munchies. Good sleep.”

“Not as woody as its OG parent but equally potent stuff. 

Only takes a few joints to get mongled”
“Uplifting happy kind of high. Definitely recommend it.”

“beware of this 'Naughty or Nice' strain. sown from seed is a gamble since the strain's genetics are very unstable and inconsistent with producing flower 'buds' as some plant's flowers may fern or fluff out. good phenotypes are 1:200 plants, so its best to get clones from the dispensary if cultivating this strain especially since the flowering time is very late, oct-dec, and is best flowered indoors or by an outdoor l...”
“They don't call it the Holy Trinity" for nothing. Hits hard then buckles you up for a ride. Very relaxing smoke
column4: followed by a feeling of euphoria and cerebral activity. Pungent but not unbearable. Recommend doing something active after otherwise get ready to be a 'COUCHTRONAUT'”"

column3: “I smoke the 3 Kings dab and next thing I know I'm at Denny's eating a hash brown”

“Perfectly balanced high but it will still have you
off your face”
“Usually it takes me a little while to get high but with this with just a few puffs I was delighted! Not only was I able to get a better and lasting high it helped me sleep great.”
“A lovely strain. Puts me right to sleep. Try combining with GSC keef.”
“very nice high. beautiful fluffy buds and very good price from craft collective. not 5/5 just because it was only around 16% the but with cost comes quality”
“very mellow body high”

“hands down a top notch strain that will give you instant effects after the first pool and a nice balance of indica sativa highs. the countdown is great as well I will recommend this strain  for loss of appetite insomnia and relaxing muscles and anxiety”
“Excellent daytime medicine. Great anti-depressant.”
“Love it! It is perfect how effective it is yet it's not too heavy to handle and tastes amazing!”
“I have this in concentrate its perfect for my mood throughout the day”

“Perfect balance of Sativas uplifting happiness and the body bliss of a good Kush medication. I might just call this strain the best all-purpose medicine I've yet tried. Not too sedating, but you'll be content doing anything!”

“perfect hybrid- the buds smell like a Chinese person in a rice paddy. nice smooth pleasant taste. great body buzz from this and also heavy head effects-the best of Indica and the best of sativa properties as far as use.”
“Three Kings is a combination of Headband, OG Kush, and Sour Diesel that provides a smooth and pleasant tasting smoke.  Good for pain relief, relaxing, and relieving stress.”

“Definitely comes on slow but well worth the wait! SOLD ON 3 KINGS!! Nice smooth body buzz to start and then a boost of creative energy that helps you get shit done! Can make you feel a lil angsty if you already suffer from anxiety, but I loved every bit of the 3 distinct highs you get from this strain! #impressed”
“New favorite. Very smooth, sour flavor.”
“it is the greatest strain ever never been as stoned as I was after on blunt”
“Great for insomnia and anxiety. Makes you a bit sleepy, but you can still function. Difficult to think.”
“pain just goes away. love it.”
“Great Strain. Capitalist Dispensaries would have U pay 240@OZ... No Worries... U can get this Excellent Herb for $125@OZ in White Center - Herban Legends. Get er Now!”

“Whew!!! I gotta tell ya!!! I snacked up an 1/8 of this 3 Kings because I'd never smoked it. Well, SO GLAD I DID. I didn't even wanna walk to raid my fridge. Beautiful arome and Earth's Healing, as usual, has wonderfully cured nuggets. I went back a day later and bought another 1/8th just to hold it down before it is all gone. Since I've moved to Tucson the only better reefer I've burned is Gorilla Glue #4.”

“if you're going for bag appeal, this is isn't the best strain. other than that, it smells like sweet kush and pungent diesel and the smell is strong enough to reek up an entire room. I have a very high tolerance and this weed got me higher off one joint than i've been since the last time i dabbed.  It's a very heady indica that gives you that headband feeling at the top of your skull and a very slumped upper body hig...”
“Very decent taste. Don't feel any pressure in head from the Headband, but solid Hybrid all the same.”
“Made for a good night churro🔥👅”
“Amazing. Must have on favorites. Lift off!”

“Really Strong Strain.... I couldn't even Finish.... Best to smoke At Nighy before sleep.... I woke up high
Af”

“leave cultivation to the Master Gardeners and professionals. seeds from this strain produce phenotypes that are so different from one to the next that my friends and I have dubbed this strain The Naughty or Nice weed. you can walk into the Garden on Halloween to ask the plants trick or treat? because by Thanksgiving you'll know what to be thankful for - everything you have to look forward to Christmas with. I have up...”
“Isn't mixing Headband with OG Kush and Sour Diesel just crossing it with what it's already made of? Good bud though.”
“Man this stuff is top notch. Excellent sativa with a very productive high. Tastes piney with hints of lemon. Was talkative, euphoric and relaxed all in one. Grab it if you can! A”
“i smoked it right before watching. a scary movies and it was the best !!”
“3 stars, has POTENTial bt the one I'm puffn on at the moment ain't all ther. sour pines smell good strain tho would definitely try it again from a different source”

“Seems to be a indica dominate at first look because its darker/clumpy and VERY sticky. Stuck a nug to the wall a half hour ago and its still there haha, very good for anxiety/stress. Would like to try vaping this.”
“very smooth fruity with a lil spice. awesome chill strain.”
“TOP Notch Strain! One of my all-time favorites, euphoric and stress free after toking on some of this bad boy. Next time you hit a dispensary and they have this bud, BUY!”
“1st time smoking, and I'm hooked. The best I've smoked so far.”
“would give 10 stars if i could!!!!!!!!!!!!”

“Great dank taste. Great high that doesn't interfere with sleep but still provides a pleasant buzz for the evening. Offers a pretty smooth smoke and the buds are nice and chunky. Definitely one of my all-time favorite strains for chilling out after a long day!”
“Despite the fact it is sativa dominant, it sure acts like an indica. I have kinda a high tolerance, but this did me in within two hits. LOVE IT.”
“Awesome for my anxiety and mood also helps me fee energetic and focused has a nice diesel earthy taste and is a really nice smoke I'm using the concentrated oil”
“great for anxiety. thoughts melt away into a psychedelic trance which calms the mind.”

“Sticky, icky, icky!!! And the smell is mad intense!!! Don't try to hide it...you just can't. With this strain I've been seizure free for 3 days and when I did have one, the after math (the ouchies and sore body) wasn't that bad. What ever soreness I had was gone by morning. This strain is a must puff, keeps your mind correct but with lots of talking and giggles.”

“Gives me mild bursts of anxiety but the ability to remain calm is still there. It's definitely not my personal favorite and I wouldn't buy it again but it's a good high, not too racy. Thoughts can get tangled and messy and it quickly becomes annoying. I would say it's probably best for when you're already in a calm state of mind. I wouldn't use it to get happy" like a lot of other hybrids.”"
“Very uplifting and balanced - I can feel my day's stress melt away and my body is just so much lighter. Not intense in any aspect, not overpowering either.”

“This strain made my anxiety so much worse! When high I felt great, good body high but once I came down and especially the next day I felt horribly anxious! It's happened every single time. It's done the same for my husband as well. If you have anxiety, stay away from this strain!”

“having just put down the half gram joint i rolled...half way through....my thoughts.
timeline
before putting the joint down
feeling the head effects almost immediately after 4 pokes
halfway through joint
coughing and putting out
5 mins after extinguish
I realize I don't want to tell you anymore but will. A lush head buzz and central cerebral calmness running all the way through my eyes. I usually run great eye pressu...”

“710 pen is hillarious! Had the full gram cartridge and it was sick! Very mental high and a lot of indica attributes! Love the neutral flavor! Only thing that bothered me a bit was the excess of dizziness.”

“Well tasting bud, got me high quick n crashed hard 
really helped depression and anxiety, i actually made conversation with a stranger”
“Very strong high, both physical and cerebral. Def a new favorite.”
“Excellent taste and great daytime strain”
“Heavy hitter, sit you down type of strain. An easy favorite for me. If I see it, I grab it every time.”

“I smoked an eighth of this and went moshing. this is some loud loud, but a very good high. nothing crazy, really good body high. I was drinking beer with this one and let me tell you, I had one of the best nights of my life. I felt so wasted yet so in control and conscious. it was great :)”
“Good”

“Well what can i say but I think the three strains used to breed this plant into existence were better off alone it smells better than it taste that's for sure bud tender said it was an Indica dominant hybrid she was wrong it the exact opposite I really fell ripped off, have yo fork out more $ for an Indica now”

“I won't write a review on a strain until I have smoked a half oz of it. Definitely not impressed. I was originally getting Skywalker OG, but changed to this last minute. I'm not sure of the THC content but I'd be willing to bet it's not that high.
Ob...”
“it alright. good high but in the end it made me feel nauseated.”
“Very good strain wouldn't mind having this again”
“Good”
“Good”

“Very trippy and relaxing high. Really wakes you up and it's great for soreness and anxiety. Cures daily gloominess and very potent. It was a really good kick that lasted long with a cerebral high that leaves you happy”
“DOPE”
“Great day time”

“This stuff was ok. The other night I smoked a bong with it and I had a bad trip. Dizzy with a headache and I couldn't chew food cause my mouth was so dry. I passed out though so if you want to sleep, this strain may be good. Didn't help my pain though.”
“Love it. Woke up feeling very sick. I'm half way thru the blunt and I feel wonderfully relaxed. The taste isn't the best but great bud if your sick.”
“Shit is DOPE!!”
“love this strain”
“One of my favorites”
“Great body high!”

“Getting this today!!!!
Can't wait to try it with my husband 💚”
“this shit is pretty fucking decent”
“Real good shit a real nice strain with a knock you off your ass high”

“this strain has become one of my favorites... I mainly smoke this in the evening. Its properties totally relax me. i have problems sleeping at night, so this puts me out and i sleep through. wake up feeling refreshed”
“3 Kings is by far my favorite strain.  its so hard to explain why, but i think the best way to try is.... it makes you one with the earth.”
“It straight”

“not that great, I barley got a buzz from it and I had oil coming out of the bottom of the cartridge, this strain in my opinion is weak.”

“This strain is okay. I'd never buy it again( and I had a whole z of it,unfortunately.) it didn't get me that high( though I do have a high tolerance) but it's definitely my least favorite strain by a long shot (except with Bruce banner but I'm not positive that actually was the strain) but I thought I'd really enjoy it, OG kush,sour diesel and headband seems like it'd make a great strain, but like I said I'm picky.”
